control_attributes.control_description: The organization, upon termination of individual employment:                                              a. Disables information system access within [Assignment: organization-defined time period];b. Terminates/revokes any authenticators/credentials associated with the individual;c. Conducts exit interviews that include a discussion of [Assignment: organization-defined information security topics];d. Retrieves all security-related organizational information system-related property;e. Retains access to organizational information and information systems formerly controlled by terminated individual; andf. Notifies [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] within [Assignment: organization-defined time period
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization implements a tamper protection program for the information system, system component, or information system service.
